name: Default properties
description:
When not all Properties are set, default properties will be applied:

* `sampleTime` - `int` - `60`
* `flashEnabled` - `boolean` - `true`
* `accEnabled` - `boolean` - `false`
* `gravEnabled` - `boolean` - `false`
* `gyroEnabled` - `boolean` - `false`
* `rotationEnabled` - `boolean` - `false`
* `movementDetectionEnabled` - `boolean` - `true`
* `fingerDetectionExpiryTime` - `int` - `-1`
* `pulseDetectionExpiryTime` - `int` - `10000`
* `waitForStartRecordingSignal` - `boolean` - `false`
